name: PagerDuty
long_description: PagerDuty is an operations performance platform delivering visibility and actionable intelligence across the entire incident lifecycle. Their SaaS-based solution empowers over 10,000 small, mid-size and enterprise global customers such as Comcast, eHarmony, Slack and Lululemon with the insight to intelligently respond to critical disruptions for exceptional customer experience. PagerDuty was founded to deliver a new and innovative approach to increase business response and efficiency. When brand reputation depends on customer satisfaction, PagerDuty arms businesses with the insight to proactively manage incidents and events that may impact customers across their IT environment.
one_liner: Real-time visibility into critical apps and services all in one place.

name: StatusPage
long_description: Statuspage is the #1 status and incident communication tool, acquired by Atlassian in 2016. For more information, check out our new LinkedIn page: https://www.linkedin.com/showcase/18261232/
one_liner: The best way to communicate with users around downtime.

name: Neptune.io
long_description:
Neptune is an observability startup that offers one-stop incident enrichment and automation platform for IT Operations and DevOps teams.

It is a fact of life that servers and applications go down causing IT outages. Today most of the IT incident response is manual, tedious and lengthy resulting in more downtime and losses for businesses. At the same it's very painful for a DevOps engineer to wake up at midnight and on weekends to deal with server and application alerts. 

Enter Neptune, which lets a DevOps engineer automate his incident response steps --Troubleshooting + Resolution + Documentation,  so that he/she can fix the incidents in minutes instead of hours. So it's a win-win deal : For businesses downtime is minimized, and for DevOps engineers they need not worry about a deluge of alerts and midnight wake up calls.

Big companies like Amazon, Facebook etc built sophisticated incident response tools to achieve high availability and resiliency. We have architected and built one such tool for AWS. Now Neptune is making one such tool available for everyone. 

Give it a try at www.neptune.io
one_liner: A self-healing platform to enrich and fix server alerts automatically

name: Appcanary
long_description:
Never run vulnerable software again.
We monitor your servers, and notify you when you need to update. 

Try us for free: https://appcanary.com
one_liner: Appcanary tracks the dependencies you use in your apps and serversâ€¦

name: Parsagon
long_description:
Parsagon is an AI that can collect and analyze publications from any government body in any jurisdiction. It currently parses and analyzes legislation, press releases, speeches, meeting minutes, executive orders, and much more in 64 countries and counting.

Fortune/Global 500 companies, policy firms, and other organizations are using Parsagon to uncover policy insights in hundreds of jurisdictions that they would otherwise miss. Customers use us to:

- Analyze changes in US state education policy
- Generate reports on UK financial regulations
- Monitor vaccine policies across the EU
- And much more!
one_liner: AI to track and analyze public policy

name: Keep
all_locations: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel; Remote
long_description:
Keep is an open-source AIOps platform. Keep acts as a single pane of glass to all your alerts from any monitoring tool and helps you turn 1000s into just 10s of meaningful alerts.

Keep joined forces with Elastic on May 2025.

name: highlight.io
long_description:
highlight.io is the open source, full-stack monitoring platform. With just a few lines of code, Highlight makes it easy to understand what's slowing down your users and swiftly address errors and regressions on your web app.  Imagine that you have a customer reporting an issue on your web app. With highlight.io, you can playback their exact interactions to reproduce the bug and get notified of any future errors that could happen.

That being said, weâ€™re just getting started! We have plans to go way deeper into your observability stack to give you all of the visibility you need. Join us on this journey:
- Star us on GitHub (https://github.com/highlight/highlight) to keep up with releases and news.
- Join our Discord (https://highlight.io/community) to share product feedback and thoughts.
one_liner: The open source, fullstack monitoring platform: stop guessing whyâ€¦

name: Parea
long_description: Parea AI is the essential developer platform for debugging and monitoring every stage of LLM application development. We provide testing, evaluation, and monitoring in one unified platform. These capabilities help developers get visibility into LLM responses, quickly test and optimize prompts, and ensure customers get the best user experience.
one_liner: Test, evaluate & observe your LLM applications

name: Keywords AI
long_description:
We're building the core infrastructure that engineers rely on to continuously trace, evaluate, and improve AI agents. 

We ingest a billion LLM logs every month to enable some of the best AI teams to ship amazing products, including 70+ YC startups.

Monitor and debug:
- Request logging with full text search to monitor AI in prod
- LLM agent tracing to debug workflows with ease
- Metrics dashboard to understand usage, cost, latency, and get product growth metrics
- User analytics to learn how every user is using your product

Build and iterate:
- Collaborative prompt management
- Playground for 350+ models
- Model gateway with OpenAI/Anthropic API interface
- Eval & experiments
one_liner: Observability and evals platform for building AI agents

name: Raindrop
former_names: this is a duplicate app per request of Diana Hu. old id: zkoticha]
long_description:
Monitor your AI agents the right way.

AI engineers use Raindrop to get alerts about hidden issues and successes in their AI agents.

Raindrop sends you alerts when your AI misbehaves and links straight to the events, so you can dig into the conversations or traces, understand the root cause, and fix it, fast.

name: Aravolta
long_description:
Aravolta provides a single pane of glass software for data centers to increase uptime, reduce costs, and improve performance.

A single utility node onboards every asset within an hour and detects hardware failures, hotspots, and other issues.

It also generates reports on important metrics like Power Usage Effectiveness (PUE), energy metering, resource utilization, and much more.
one_liner: Software to monitor, control, and optimize data centers.

name: Janus
long_description:
Janus evaluates AI agents in high-fidelity simulations before launch, catching failures in reasoning, compliance, tool usage, and performance. We simulate thousands of realistic AI users to replace manual testing and remove uncertainty in deployment.

The resulting datasets benchmark products and feed post-training loops to continuously improve performance over time.
one_liner: Battle-Test AI Agents with Human Simulation
